description: Over the past 50 years or so, Spanish filmmaker Víctor Erice has directed just four features. His latest, about a filmmaker who revisits a past project, has the pull of a well-crafted detective story.
title: Quietly transcendent 'Close Your Eyes' may be among the best films you see all year

description: A new album combines Appalachian music with Chinese folk music. Young people can't get enough.
title: From China to Appalachia: An unlikely musical fusion that's got young people hooked

description: Harris isn't someone known for delivering big speeches, and the public’s views of her are still forming. She got the nomination, after all, without running in a primary.
title: 5 takeaways from Kamala Harris’ historic acceptance speech

description: A proposed lithium mine in Serbia is spurring protests over its potential impact on the environment. The mineral is in high demand because it’s crucial for the batteries that run electric vehicles.
title: A lithium mine in Serbia could rev up Europe's e-vehicles, but opposition is fierce

description: A nose spray version of the drug epinephrine will soon hit the market, giving people having allergic reactions an alternative to needles. But some allergists are not in a hurry to prescribe it.
title: A needle-less alternative to EpiPen has FDA approval. Will doctors prescribe it?

description: Cars and trucks have gotten bigger and taller, with deadly consequences for pedestrians. A bill being introduced today in Congress would create federal standards for hood height and visibility.
title: As cars and trucks get bigger and taller, lawmakers look to protect pedestrians

description: Pump prices having been falling all summer, and as Labor Day approaches, they're 47 cents lower than this time last year. Some analysts see $3 gasoline in our future.
title: Gas prices are down. We could be headed for lows not seen since 2021

description: This week was the Democratic National Convention, which went full-on Met Gala and/or Olympics. If you watched that (and the Republican counterprogramming), you'll get at least five questions right.
title: What surprise DNC speaker did Trump once say was his VP pick? Find out in the quiz

description: The Botswana government says the huge 2,492-carat diamond is the second-biggest ever discovered in a mine. It's the biggest diamond found since 1905. It weighs approximately half a kilogram.
title: The biggest diamond in over a century is found in Botswana — a whopping 2,492 carats

description: The plan would adjust delivery times while keeping a commitment to a maximum five-day delivery for the Ground Advantage program nationwide and a maximum three-day delivery for local first-class mail.
title: USPS proposes changes to save $3 billion per year, starting in 2025

description: Instead, the special, previously unannounced guest was … nobody. The night’s headliner, Vice President Harris, had the spotlight to herself — which may have been the point all along.
title: So, about that special musical guest .... Where was Beyoncé for the DNC's final night?

description: The Chicks and Pink brought plenty of star power of their own.
title: Watch The Chicks and Pink perform at the DNC's final night

description: A group of Republicans, including Kinzinger, have come together in support of Harris. Kinzinger said he lost faith in Trump and experienced a “profound sorrow” after Jan. 6.
title: Former Republican lawmaker offers a blistering assessment of Trump in DNC speech

description: He criticized Trump’s past remarks on Russia. In particular, he went after Trump’s reluctance to hold Russia accountable for their invasion of Ukraine — as well as his lack of commitment to NATO.
title: Sen. Mark Kelly warns of America’s international standing if Trump is reelected

description: Like her sister Kamala Harris, Maya Harris is a lawyer, and served as a senior policy adviser for Hillary Clinton's 2016 presidential campaign's policy agenda.
title: Who is Maya Harris, Kamala Harris' sister? Plus, highlights from her DNC speech

description: Actress Kerry Washington introduced two of Kamala Harris’ great-nieces to set the record straight on how to pronounce their auntie’s name.
title: How do you pronounce Kamala's name? Her great-nieces gave the DNC a lesson

description: Five people who suffered devastating losses from gun violence promised to push for gun reform.
title: People who lost loved ones to gun violence spoke at the DNC, pushing for gun reform

description: Giffords served in the House of Representatives until 2012, after an assassination attempt left her with a severe brain injury. Along with Giffords, 18 other people were shot. Six were killed.
title: Gabby Giffords recounts her own shooting in DNC remarks
